document.full_text: the dollar hit a three-year low against a basket of currencies on thursday as strong corporate earnings buoyed risk appetite in illiquid pre-easter trade, threatening to drive the greenback to historic lows.
document.title: dollar tumbles to 3-year low
lines_and_colors: the dollar hit a three-year low against a basket of currencies on thursday as strong corporate earnings buoyed risk appetite in illiquid pre-easter trade, threatening to drive the greenback to historic lows.
